refnamediv.refpurpose: The PatternSet data type defines patterns that can be grouped into sets and nested into FileSets.

refentry.refsect1:
&ref.title.attributes;
Attributes for <patternset> tag
&taskAttributes.table.titlesLine.all;
includes
String
Comma- or space-separated list of patterns of files that must be included; all files are included when omitted.
n/a
No
includesfile
String
The name of a file; each line of this file is taken to be an include pattern.
n/a
No
excludes
String
comma- or space-separated list of patterns of files that must be excluded; no files (except default excludes) are excluded when omitted.
n/a
No
excludesfile
String
The name of a file; each line of this file is taken to be an exclude pattern.
n/a
No

&ref.title.supportedNestedTags;
The <patternset> tag only supports <include> and <exclude>. The <include> and the <exclude> tags tags must have a name attribute that contains the pattern to include/exclude.
